sentences.sContent: The public psychosocial status is mostly affected by the unsureness of information in the event of epidemic outbreak.
sentences.sContent_eng: The public psychosocial status is mostly affected by the unsureness of information in the event of epidemic outbreak.
sentences.sCn: 面对疫情及突发事件，信息的不确定性是影响民众心态变化的主要因素。
